devdoc.details: A decentralized game where users bet on cryptocurrency price volatility Uses Flare's FTSO for price feeds, FDC for finalization, and RNG for winner selection

claimRewards(uint256).details: Claim rewards for a specific round

params._roundId: The round to claim rewards for

params._entryFee: Minimum amount of FLR to enter the lottery
params._fdcHub: Address of the FDC Hub contract
params._ftsoRegistry: Address of the FTSO Registry contract
params._randomProvider: Address of the Random Provider contract
params._roundDuration: Duration of each round in seconds
params._volatilityThreshold: Threshold to determine high/low volatility in basis points

finalizeRound().details: Finalize the current round Uses FDC Hub for finalized data and gets a random number for jackpot selection

makePrediction(bool).details: Make a prediction for the current round

params._isHighVolatility: True if predicting high volatility, false otherwise

devdoc.title: VolatilityLottery
